Detailed Description

Implementation of CRC.

Function for calculating CRC16 checksum based on the polynomial: x^16 + x^15 + x^2 + 1 (0xa001). The code is based on sample code in avr-libc documentation.

An internal CRC value is used. This be reset, updated, and read back.

Date:
24-Jan-2010
Author:
